Key Match Events: Mohamed Kudus scored the evening's first goal
Omar Marmoush scored a 69th-minute equalizer for Egypt
Mohamed Kudus restored Ghana's lead two minutes later
Mostafa Mohamed scored an equalizer for Egypt
Pre-Game Insights: Egypt and Ghana were touted as the two teams that would comfortably top their easy-looking Group B
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt will now have to win their final group game to qualify to the next round
Ghana will go into their final game needing a statement victory to qualify to the round of 16 stages
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohamed Salah was injured at the 45th minute
Egypt's Pharaohs and Ghana's Black Stars played with energy and determination
Both teams will be keenly watching the clash between Cape Verde and Mozambique
Others: The match complicated round of 16 qualification for both teams
